body: @GmretOn ahhh I see. I haven’t read any of the bonus chapters of the VN. I should probably get on that at some point as I’ve heard good things. Are they included in the 07th mod?

@uber1alles Actually no, this is in Miotsukushi, the alternative final chapter to Matsuribayashi. It has the same conversation to the beginning where Keiichi went to apologize to the girl he injured with a BB gun
The fact that this is apparently Tsumihorobishi, likely right after the incident at the school with Rena,really puts a grim twist on this. Both of them are gonna be dead within 48 hours.
I came here to fap not to feel
